com.inn.headstartdemo.security.mgmt

Class PasswordExpiryDataAnalyzerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inn.headstartdemo.security.mgmt.PasswordExpiryDataAnalyzerService

  • public class PasswordExpiryDataAnalyzerService
extends Object
    Analyses PasswordExpiryDetailBean and CustomerContext and generates various interpretations for managing passwords. Also, this service assists PasswordManagementService in management of passwords and related features.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Auto Generated By HeadStart

    • Method Detail

      • isPasswordExpiryOn

        public boolean isPasswordExpiryOn(Map<String,Object> custInfoMap,
                         PasswordFeatureBean featureBean)
        returns true if the password expiration feature is ON in configuration. Also this returns true when the current user belong to an organization which is marked to be forced ON. refer: isPwdFeaturesForcedOn API this is used internally.
        Parameters:
        custInfoMap - represents customer information, refer CustomerInfo getCustomerInfo API.
        featureBean - represents password features holder, refer PasswordFeatureBean.
        Returns:

      • isFirstTimeLogin

        public boolean isFirstTimeLogin(Map<String,Object> custInfoMap,
                       PasswordFeatureBean featureBean,
                       PasswordExpiryDetailBean detailBean)
        returns true if the first time login feature ON in configuration and user is logging in for the first time. also refer: isPwdFeaturesForcedOn API this is used internally.
        Parameters:
        custInfoMap - represents customer information, refer CustomerInfo getCustomerInfo API.
        featureBean - represents password features holder, refer PasswordFeatureBean.
        Returns:
